actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 in order to increase the amount of a State's allocation which may be used for certain sheltered facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to increase from 10 to 25 percent the amount of funds allotted to States which may be used for construction of indoor ice skating rinks and swimming pools.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 in order to increase the amount of a State's allocation which may be used for certain sheltered facilities.
